heading: HB01214
0: AN ACT SEPARATING LANDAN NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL (UPPER KLINAN NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL ANNEX) IN BARANGAY LANDAN, POLOMOLOK, SOUTH COTABATO FROM ITS MOTHER SCHOOL, UPPER KLINAN NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL, AND CONVERTING IT INTO AN INDEPENDENT NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL TO BE KNOWN AS THE LANDAN NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01214
FULL TITLE : AN ACT SEPARATING LANDAN NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL (UPPER KLINAN NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL ANNEX) IN BARANGAY LANDAN, POLOMOLOK, SOUTH COTABATO FROM ITS MOTHER SCHOOL, UPPER KLINAN NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL, AND CONVERTING IT INTO AN INDEPENDENT NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL TO BE KNOWN AS THE LANDAN NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
